metadata.title: CVE-2019-10022 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.01.01. There is a NULL pointer dereference in the function Gfx::opSetExtGState in Gfx.cc.

notes.note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 pfsmorigo> since there is not public repository, just a tarball, I analised the file in question (Gfx.cc) with the affected version and they seems the same mdeslaur> couldn't reproduce in poppler

criterions.comment: poppler package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.76.1-0ubuntu3').
xpdf package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
